thread.title: Bayer wins EU approval for $62.5 bln Monsanto buy

title: Bayer wins EU approval for $62.5 bln Monsanto buy
text:
Bayer wins EU approval for $62.5 bln Monsanto buy Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:44 
German conglomerate Bayer has won EU antitrust approval for its $62.5 billion buy of U.S. peer Monsanto, the latest in a trio of mega mergers that will reshape the agrochemicals industry. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
German conglomerate Bayer has won EU antitrust approval for its $62.5 billion buy of U.S. peer Monsanto, the latest in a trio of mega mergers that will reshape the agrochemicals industry.
